name: mutant
description: A scalable microservices-based system for detecting mutant DNA sequences and tracking verification statistics. Built to handle high traffic loads (100 to 1M requests/second).

scripts.start: concurrently --names "MUTANT,STATS,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "green,blue,magenta" "npm run start:mutant" "npm run start:stats" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.test: echo "Running tests..." && cd dna-demo && ./mvnw test && cd ../stats-service && ./mvnw test
